scripts.deploy:workflows: bun run deploy workflows/sync-repo/embedding && bun run deploy workflows/sync-repo/init && bun run deploy workflows/sync-repo/cron
scripts.deploy:workflows:prod: bun run deploy:prod workflows/sync-repo/embedding && bun run deploy:prod workflows/sync-repo/init && bun run deploy:prod workflows/sync-repo/cron
scripts.deploy:all: bun run deploy rate-limiter && bun run deploy workflows/sync-repo/embedding && bun run deploy workflows/sync-repo/cron && bun run deploy workflows/sync-repo/init
scripts.deploy:all:prod: bun run deploy:prod rate-limiter && bun run deploy:prod workflows/sync-repo/embedding && bun run deploy:prod workflows/sync-repo/cron && bun run deploy:prod workflows/sync-repo/init
